name: Kitchen Krapper (Alpha)
description:
Kitchen Krapper is an exciting new cooking game currently in development! Put your culinary skills to the test and rise up the ranks to become the top chef in the kitchen.

Controls

  • Movement: ASWD
  • Interact:  E
  • Alt Interact: F

Gameplay

In this demo level, you'll have to deliver as many recipes as you can within the time limit. But don't worry, we've got your back! Here's how to play:

  1. Deliver the recipes by making the appropriate dishes for the waiting customers. Keep an eye on the order list and make sure you get it right.
  2. Be careful, though! Wrong recipes will cost you negative points, and we don't want that.
  3. To get the required recipe ingredients, go near the appropriate counter and press "E" to interact and grab the kitchen object.
  4. Use the knife table to cut the necessary items like cheese, cabbage, and tomatoes. Pro tip: press "F" to cut the kitchen object faster.
  5. Use the stove to cook the meat, but be careful not to overcook it! Keep an eye out for the warning symbol and make sure to grab the food before it's ruined.
  6. Once you have all the components of the dish, use the plates to grab and serve the completed recipe to the waiting customers.
  7. Remember, the customers will only get their food when it's served on a plate.

And there's still so much more to discover in the full gameplay!

So, are you ready to cook up a storm in Kitchen Krapper? Get in the kitchen and show us what you've got!
